strapiPost.title: Taco Ride
strapiPost.content:
This Saturday you can ride down the Razorback Greenway and make pit stops for tacos with the Tour de Tacos event. 

  • For young mothers: This will be the 2nd annual Tour de Tacos put on by the Compassion House. All funding will go toward providing pregnant and parenting teens a place to live along with an empowering support system. The Compassion House works to equip young mothers to be the best parents they can be. 
  • Taco tour: There is a 7 mile, 30 mile and 62 mile ride along the Greenway. The routes begin and end at Lewis and Clark in Rogers. Strava has a map of the tour. Day of event registration is $75. 

For more details, click HERE.
